ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: (1) Childcare activities to provide physical, moral and spiritual care for underprivileged children (2) leadership and skills development programs for underprivileged children (2) Free Tutoring classes for the poor (3) Poor Feeding (4) Community Development Activities (5) Counseling for youth and school children to help overcome academic pressure, depression, and addiction to wrong habits (5) Spiritual nourishment and personality development Retreats (6) Relief to victims of natural disasters.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: The purpose of the funding is for the holistic development programs that are conducted on weekly basis to provide physical, moral and spiritual care for underprivileged children. HDUC imparts values, leadership abilities and skills in marginalized children. HDUC also includes counseling for youth and school children belonging to the weaker section in the society to help overcome academic pressure, depression, and addiction to wrong habits.

sourceOfFunds.departmentName: FUND FOR EDUCATION AND ENTERPRISE DEVELOPMENT
sourceOfFunds.purpose: The funding was utilised for the purpose of training children workers who work with the underprivileged children children to equip them for effective service of physical, moral, educational, and spiritual care necessary for their holistic transformation. The training includes enlightening them on practical ways and methods to be adopted for the social and spiritual uplifting of children in slums and rural areas, which include not only counseling and training children, but also their parents.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The 21st Century Human Empowerment Programme,"The Community School" at Kombuthooki,Yercaud is an "Innovative Initiative " by Dr.Bro.George KJ. While on a camp trip with students in 1999,he was moved by the plight of thousands of illiterate,most backward tribals from the 22 villages & nearly 100 hamlets of the interior forest region with no basic facilities.School was a distant dream for the children of this area. So,immediately he conceptualized & started a Community School with just 7 students with funds from well wishers.From 7 students in 2000,today the School has 955 students(all first generation learners).The school has achieved 100% results almost every year. A follow up plan takes care of students passing out from 12 std-to find them admissions in colleges and placements thereafter for deserving candidates. The Holistic Education(that includes ict skills, sports & games,vocational skills,life skills,scouting,dance,music,art etc.) is imparted without any gender bias & stresses the need of Girl Education-50% of the students are girls. There is a free hostel .Incentives to the poor tribal students include food,books,uniforms,footwear ,transport and are provided free of cost. A Community Health Centre,Non Formal Adult Education,Self Help Groups are all an integral part of the School.A green enthusiast Bro.George has installed a Humethane plant in the school & other steps to preserve the biodiversity are strictly followed. Striving to take the 21st Century Human Empowerment programme further with the help of well wishers,friends,aid,sponsorship etc, the Community Tribal Project and -the Community Tribal School ,The Montfort Community Trust strives to narrow down the gap between the â€œhavesâ€ and the â€œhave-notsâ€ and enable the excluded and the marginilized tribals of Kombuthooki and neighbouring villages and hamlets to be Educated, Liberated & Empowered A 21ST CENTURY HUMAN EMPOWERMENT PROGRAMME

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Each and every child of â€œNesackkarangalâ€ has its own sad story to tell. Children left in roadside garbage â€“ bins, bus stopping and children who lost their both parents in fire accidents and road accidents are all residing here. Abandoned children received through Police Stations are also living here. The children are given Education in leading Educational Institutions sponsored by the School by itself or supported by Donors. The Medical aid and Evening Tuition classes in groups are all given freely to the inmates. Generally the academic performances of our children are good. Most of them are ranking students. There are also children who are weak in their grasping and retention capacity. Our evening tuition classes taken by trained teachers help the children to improve their studies. Nesackkarangal also involves in other Public Service Activities like adopting Tribal villages in Yercaud Hill stations by conducting Free medical Camps, creating awareness about cleanliness motivations etc., Nesackkarangal is running a voluntary Blood Donation Programme through which our Voluntary donors donate blood of various groups in times of emergency need. EXISTING FACILITIES AVAILABLE Our Trust is having the following facilities available. â€¢ Sponsored Buildings for Boys & Girls children separately. â€¢ Sponsored Vehicle used as conveyance for academic and medical treatment purposes. â€¢ Sponsored Furniture for the usage of children. â€¢ Sponsored Library for the usage of children. â€¢ Sponsored other Basic Amenities for children. Nesackkarangalâ€™s Old Age Home ïƒ˜ A Home that makes their old age home away from home, a reality. ïƒ˜ A Home for those who doesnâ€™t have even the basic amenities in life. A Home that provides all amenities totally free of cost i.e., food, dress, healthy residence, timely medical care, library, entertainment and also a chance to share their love and affection with the Nesackkarangal children.
